markdown: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [task](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsTasks/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis [Tawenu](/tawenu/) wishes to renegotiate the Duape tribe's contract with the Vailian Trading Company. The deal will legally pass ownership of their lands to Vailian control upon the death of their ailing chieftain. Tawenu has had little luck navigating the trading company's bureaucracy. Since he was thrown out of the office, he asked the Watcher to intervene on his behalf. I can start by speaking with [Luca](/luca/) inside the Vailian Trading Company offices. ## Walkthrough After talking to the poor Huana outside, head inside and talk to [Luca](/luca/). He will reiterate that the contract is lawful and add that [Tawenu](/tawenu/) should consider himself lucky all he lost was the forged contract. At this point, you can choose to either side with Tawenu or Luca. ###### Side with Tawenu * Negotiate with Luca in his office. ** [Streetwise](/streetwise/) 4 - Threaten him with making a mess of his job by telling everyone how the company conducts itself for a bribe of {{cp2|1100}}. Though this won't solve the problem. ** [Diplomacy](/diplomacy/) 5 - Point out that such a strategy will only drive the Huana into the arms of the RDC, then follow with [Diplomacy](/diplomacy/) 4 or a threat as described below. After all, something you never had can't be a loss. This will result in nullifying the contract. ** [Intimidate](/intimidate/) 4 - Threaten Luca that you don't have time to solve this politely. Then: *** [Intimidate](/intimidate/) 5. *** [Insight](/insight/) 5 - Luca bribes you {{cp2|800}}. ** Steal the [Forged Contract](/forgedContract/) from Luca's chest (locked, difficulty 8). You can pickpocket the [key](/lucasKey/) from Luca. Then replace the real contract with the forgery. The real contract is in the shelves next to the stairs up. You can easily sneak past the clerk watching the area. Go back to Luca once you finished the trick. * If nothing works, meet Luca in [The Wild Mare](/theWildMare/) at night. Being a little drunk and unguarded, he is more agreeable to a bribe or persuasion. ** [Intimidate](/intimidate/) 2, then [Intimidate](/intimidate/) 3 or [Diplomacy](/diplomacy/) 5. ** [Bluff](/bluff/) 2 - Bribe him {{cp2|300}}. ** Tell Luca that the contract is unjust, then [Diplomacy](/diplomacy/) 3, followed by [Diplomacy](/diplomacy/) 4 or [Streetwise](/streetwise/) 3. ** Distract him with a drink then pickpocket [Luca's Key](/lucasKey/) with [Sleight of Hand](/sleightOfHand/) 3. * Return to Tawenu. ** ''"Thank you. I'll accept whatever payment you have to offer."'' - Receive payment in gems (2× [Emerald](/emeraldDeadfire/), 1× [Mother of Pearl](/motherOfPearl/)). Moderate Positive reputation with the Huana. ** ''"No charge."'' - No payment, Moderate Positive reputation with the Huana, [Dutiful](/dutiful/). ** ''"Hold on to it. Teaching the [Vailian Trading Company](/vailianTradingCompany/) a lesson was well worth the effort."'' - No payment, Minor Negative reputation with the Vailian Trading Company, Moderate Positive reputation with the Huana. ** ''"Seashells from the natives. Isn't this... quaint."'' - Gems, Minor Negative and Moderate Positive reputation with the Huana. ** ''"This is all? I assume you paid for food in Neketaka. Give me whatever you have left."'' - Gems, {{cp2|45}}, Minor Negative and Moderate Positive reputation with the Huana. * Later on, you'll witness as Luca got fired in his office. Talk to him to recruit him to work on your ship. ###### Side with Luca * Tell Tawenu that you're on Luca's side. You'll lose Minor reputation with the Huana and gain Minor reputation with the Vailian Trading Company. * Return to Luca to get {{cp2|1700}}. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/03_Neketaka_Vailian_District/03_TSK_Coming_To_Terms.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Coming to Terms''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Tawenu wishes to renegotiate the Duape tribe's contract with the Vailian Trading Company. Hopefully that solves Luca's problem. |- | rowspan="11" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Convince the Vailian Trading Company to nullify the contract.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | Luca insists that the contract with the Duape tribe is perfectly valid. Tawenu was overjoyed to know that his tribal lands were safe. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30002 | I tried removing the villager's problem in the most efficient way possible. He was overjoyed to know that his tribal lands were safe. |}
